title: The Undefeated
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/War victims
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Hospital care

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Self-realization
description: The story of a young glider pilot who lost both his legs and the power of speech during the war, yet was determined to become an active and useful member of the community once more. The film tells how, through his own courage and endurance, and the help of others, he was able to achieve this ambition.
